explains: n. 诉讼，诉讼程序；（会议、仪式等）议程，活动过程；（会议等的）正式记录
wordGroup: administrative proceedings 行政程序；行攻诉讼
proceedings of the csee 中国电机工程学报（报纸名，全称是Proceedings of the Chinese Society for Electrical Engineering）

sentences.en: She was cited in the divorce proceedings.
sentences.cn: 她在离婚诉讼中被传唤。

sentences.en: The ruling could clear the way for extradition proceedings.
sentences.cn: 这项裁决也许能为引渡程序铺平道路。

sentences.en: We watched the proceedings from the balcony.
sentences.cn: 我们从阳台上观看仪式。
